document.docAuthor: Ansi, Amin Al, Alkhalaf, Areej A., Fadl, Hassan, Rasool, Iftekhar & Dhafer, Hathal Al
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of Coccinellidae (Insecta, Coleoptera) with eight new records from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of Coccinellidae (Insecta, Coleoptera) with eight new records from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

mods:name.mods:affiliation: King Saud University Museum of Arthropods, Plant Protection Department, College of Food and Agriculture Sciences, King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Biology Department, College of Science, Princess Nourah bint Abdulrahman University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Entomology Departments, Faculty of Science, Ain Shams University, Cairo, Egypt
King Saud University Museum of Arthropods, Plant Protection Department, College of Food and Agriculture Sciences, King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
King Saud University Museum of Arthropods, Plant Protection Department, College of Food and Agriculture Sciences, King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia

subSubSection.paragraph: This is a common species found almost throughout Saudi Arabia in a wide range of habitats. Both larvae and adults of this species are known as predators of aphids.

Asir : Abha, Sodah, 18°16.27'N , 42°21.52'E , 24.IV.2011, SN, Al Ansi, A., 3exs; Al Majardah, Wadi Yabah, 19°16.27'N , 41°48.46'E , 411, 2.VI.2012, SN, Al Dhafer et al., 1ex; 1.III.2012, LT, 1ex; Khamis Mushait, Wadi Bisha, 18°20.01'N , 42°42.13'E , 1990 m27.IV.2011, SN, Al Ansi, A., 6exs; Asir, Baha, Eastern Province, Makkah, Riyadh, and Tabuk. It was previously recorded from Jizan by Beccari (1971) , from Riyadh and Makkah by Talhouk (1982) and by El-Hawagry et al. (2013) , from Baha and Abdel-Dayem et al. (2017) from Riyadh and listed by Walker and Pittaway (1987) .
